arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the signing profile.

name.description: A unique signing profile name. By default generated by the provider. Signing profile names are immutable and cannot be reused after canceled.

namePrefix.description: A signing profile name prefix. The provider will generate a unique suffix. Conflicts with `name`.

platformDisplayName.description: A human-readable name for the signing platform associated with the signing profile.

platformId.description: The ID of the platform that is used by the target signing profile.

revocationRecords.description: Revocation information for a signing profile.

signatureValidityPeriod.description: The validity period for a signing job.

status.description: The status of the target signing profile.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the signing profile. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

version.description: The current version of the signing profile.

versionArn.description: The signing profile ARN, including the profile version.

name.description: A unique signing profile name. By default generated by the provider. Signing profile names are immutable and cannot be reused after canceled.

namePrefix.description: A signing profile name prefix. The provider will generate a unique suffix. Conflicts with `name`.

platformId.description: The ID of the platform that is used by the target signing profile.

signatureValidityPeriod.description: The validity period for a signing job.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the signing profile. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering SigningProfile resources.
